attributes.action: Keep up and more readily enforce the ban on hunting with dogs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fox-hunting with hounds is a cruel and barbaric 'sport', best left in the middle ages. It is highly encourageing to basic human intelligence that the government has placed a ban on this, and we the undersigned urge that this ban is upheld in an unprejudiced manner.
